about_the_game:
Think, Solve, Succeed! Embark on a journey of mathematical mastery and logic in Dotu!

Dotu is a captivating puzzle game that combines math with the challenge of logic-based puzzles.

Place dots on the board to match the target sums of rows and columns, but be prepared—each world brings new twists to test your brainpower in this easy to pick up, but hard to master puzzle game.

About the Demo:

This is a pre-release demo of Dotu that contains 28 levels.
Not all features or content are final and may change before the full release.
Think of it as an exclusive sneak peek while we keep on working on the final version!

If you found something weird? Or just have an idea to make it better?
Share it with us - Your feedback (and bug reports) are super helpful!

Enjoy the Demo and Thank you for playing!

Full Game Features:

  • 200+ Handcrafted Levels: From simple starter puzzles to mind-bending challenges, there’s always a new test for your wits.

  • 7 Unique Worlds: Each introducing innovative mechanics and puzzles to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Full support for Vulkan 1.0 ( Intel HD Graphics 5500, AMD Radeon R5 Graphics )
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Full support for Vulkan 1.2 ( NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 460 )

short_description: Whether you’re a math enthusiast, a puzzle fanatic or just looking for a fun challenge, Dotu will keep you entertained for hours with its challenging puzzles! Are you ready to become a dot-solving mastermind?
